title: How to Show Recently Played Artists on Spotify

steps.title: Open Spotify.
steps.content: Open Spotify. This app icon features black curved lines inside a green circle that you can find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . You'll see this gear icon in the top right corner of your screen. If you don't see this icon, tap Home with the house icon.

steps.title: Tap to turn the switch on next to "Recently played artists.
steps.content: Tap to turn the switch on next to "Recently played artists. " It's under the "Social" header, near the middle of the menu. A green icon indicates that the feature is enabled and your recently played artists will appear on your profile.

steps.title: Open Spotify.
steps.content: Open Spotify. You'll find it in your Applications folder in Finder or in the Start menu.

steps.title: Click next to your name.
steps.content: Click next to your name. This arrow is centered along the top of the screen and a menu should appear.

steps.title: Click .
steps.content: Click . You'll see near the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Click to turn the switch on next to "Show my recently played artists.
steps.content: Click to turn the switch on next to "Show my recently played artists. " It's under the "Social" header, near the middle of the menu. A green icon indicates that the feature is enabled and your recently played artists will appear on your profile.
